thread.title: Tottenham midfielder Nacer Chadli out for 6 weeks with an ankle ligament injury
thread.title_full: Tottenham midfielder Nacer Chadli out for 6 weeks with an ankle ligament injury

title: Tottenham midfielder Nacer Chadli out for 6 weeks with an ankle ligament injury
text:
Tottenham midfielder Nacer Chadli out for 6 weeks with an ankle ligament injury THE ASSOCIATED PRESS   8:22   8:22   
Subjects: 
United Kingdom (463) 
LONDON — Tottenham says midfielder Nacer Chadli will be out for six weeks with an ankle ligament injury sustained against Liverpool. 
The Belgium international went down after only eight minutes of the 0-0 draw on Saturday at White Hart Lane. He attempted to continue but was eventually taken off on a stretcher after 11 minutes. 
The 26-year-old Chadli's time out means he is expected to miss Tottenham's Premier League matches against London rivals Arsenal on Nov. 8 and Chelsea on Nov. 29.
